Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

This document is a foreword to a collection of works inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos, a shared universe of horror fiction. The author, a game designer and Lovecraft fan, reflects on their own introduction to Lovecraft's stories as a child and their subsequent involvement in creating the horror roleplaying genre, particularly with the 1980 game Call of Cthulhu. The collection features works by various authors, including Lovecraft himself, and is intended to provide a new way for fans to experience the Cthulhu Mythos. The author's passion for Lovecraft's work and their role in shaping the horror genre are highlighted throughout the foreword.
